h4501.definition: or מְנֹרָה; feminine of {{h4500}} (in the original sense of {{h5216}}); a chandelier; candlestick.

h4503.definition: from an unused root meaning to apportion, i.e. bestow; a donation; euphemistically, tribute; specifically a sacrificial offering (usually bloodless and voluntary); gift, oblation, (meat) offering, present, sacrifice.

h4504.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4503}}; a sacrificial offering; oblation, meat offering.

h4505.definition: from {{h5162}}; comforter; Menachem, an Israelite; Menahem.

h4506.definition: from {{h5117}}; rest; Manachath, the name of an Edomite and of a place in Moab; Manahath.

h4507.definition: from {{h4487}}; the Apportioner, i.e. Fate (as an idol); number.

h4508.definition: of foreign derivation; Minni, an Armenian province; Minni.

h4509.definition: from {{h4480}} and {{h3225}}; from (the) right hand; Minjamin, the name of two Israelites; Miniamin. Compare {{h4326}}.

h4511.definition: from the same as {{h4482}}; enumeration; Minnith, a place East of the Jordan; Minnith.

h4512.definition: from {{h5239}}; completion, i.e. (in produce) wealth; perfection.

h4513.definition: a primitive root; to debar (negatively or positively) from benefit or injury; deny, keep (back), refrain, restrain, withhold.

h4514.definition: or מַנְעֻל; from {{h5274}}; a bolt; lock.

h4517.definition: from {{h5128}}; a sistrum (so called from its rattling sound); cornet.

h4518.definition: from {{h5352}}; a sacrificial basin (for holding blood); bowl.

h4519.definition: from {{h5382}}; causing to forget; Menashsheh, a grandson of Jacob, also the tribe descended from him, and its territory; Manasseh.

h4520.definition: from {{h4519}}; a Menashshite or descendant of Menashsheh; of Manasseh, Manassites.

h4521.definition: from {{h4487}}; an allotment (by courtesy, law or providence); portion.

h4522.definition: or מִס; from {{h4549}}; properly, a burden (as causing to faint), i.e. a tax in the form of forced labor; discomfited, levy, task(-master), tribute(-tary).

h4523.definition: from {{h4549}}; fainting, i.e. (figuratively) disconsolate; is afflicted.

h4524.definition: plural masculine מְסִבִּים; or feminine מְסִבּוֹת; from {{h5437}}; a divan (as enclosing the room); abstractly (adverbial) around; that compass about, (place) round about, at table.

h4525.definition: from {{h5462}}; a fastener, i.e. (of a person) a smith, (of a thing) a prison; prison, smith.

h4526.definition: from {{h5462}}; something enclosing, i.e. a margin (of a region, of a panel); concretely, a stronghold; border, close place, hole.

h4528.definition: from the same as {{h5468}}; a colonnade or internal portico (from its rows of pillars); porch.

h4529.definition: a primitive root; to dissolve; make to consume away, (make to) melt, water.

h4530.definition: from {{h4549}} (in the sense of flowing); abundance, i.e. (adverbially) liberally; tribute.

h4531.definition: from {{h5254}}; a testing, of men (judicial) or of God (querulous); temptation, trial.

h4532.definition: the same as {{h4531}}; Massah, a place in the Desert; Massah.

h4533.definition: apparently from an unused root meaning to cover; a veil; vail.

h4535.definition: from {{h5255}} in the sense of staving off; a cordon, (adverbially) or (as a) military barrier; broken down.

h4537.definition: a primitive root; to mix, especially wine (with spices); mingle.

h4538.definition: from {{h4537}}; a mixture, i.e. of wine with spices; mixture.

h4539.definition: from {{h5526}}; a cover, i.e. veil; covering, curtain, hanging.

h4540.definition: from {{h5526}}; a covering, i.e. garniture; covering.

h4541.definition: from {{h5258}}; properly, a pouring over, i.e. fusion of metal (especially a cast image); by implication, a libation, i.e. league; concretely a coverlet (as if poured out); covering, molten (image), vail.

h4543.definition: by transp. from {{h3664}}; a magazine; store(-house), treasure.

h4545.definition: from {{h5259}} in the sense of spreading out; something expanded, i.e. the warp in a loom (as stretched out to receive the woof); web.

h4546.definition: from {{h5549}}; a thoroughfare (as turnpiked), literally or figuratively; specifically a viaduct, a staircase; causeway, course, highway, path, terrace.

h4548.definition: or מִסְמֵר; also (feminine) מַסְמְרָה; or מִסְמְרָה; or even מַשְׂמְרָה; (Ecclesiastes 12:11), from {{h5568}}; a peg (as bristling from the surface); nail.

h4549.definition: a primitive root; to liquefy; figuratively, to waste (with disease), to faint (with fatigue, fear or grief); discourage, faint, be loosed, melt (away), refuse, × utterly.

h4550.definition: from {{h5265}}; a departure (from striking the tents), i.e. march (not necessarily a single day's travel); by implication, a station (or point of departure); journey(-ing).

h4551.definition: from {{h5265}} in the sense of projecting; a missile (spear or arrow); also a quarry (whence stones are, as it were, ejected); before it was brought, dart.

h4553.definition: from {{h5594}}; a lamentation; lamentation, one mourneth, mourning, wailing.

h4554.definition: from an unused root meaning to collect; fodder; provender.

h4555.definition: from {{h5596}}; a veil (as spread out); kerchief.

h4556.definition: from {{h5596}}; scruf (as spreading over the surface); scab.

h4557.definition: from {{h5608}}; a number, definite (arithmetical) or indefinite (large, innumerable; small, a few); also (abstractly) narration; abundance, account, × all, × few, (in-) finite, (certain) number(-ed), tale, telling,   time.

h4558.definition: the same as {{h4457}}; number; Mispar, an Israelite; Mizpar. Compare {{h4559}}.

h4559.definition: feminine of {{h4437}}; enumeration; Mispereth, an Israelite; Mispereth. Compare {{h4458}}.

h4560.definition: a primitive root; to sunder, i.e. (transitively) set apart, or (reflex.) apostatize; commit, deliver.

h4564.definition: from {{h5641}}; properly, a hider, i.e. (abstractly) a hiding, i.e. aversion; hid.

h4565.definition: from {{h5641}}; properly, a concealer, i.e. a covert; secret(-ly, place).

h4568.definition: from {{h5666}}; properly, compact (part of soil), i.e. loam; clay.

h4569.definition: or feminine מַעֲבָרָה; from {{h5674}}; a crossing-place (of a river, a ford; of a mountain, a pass); abstractly, a transit, i.e. (figuratively) overwhelming; ford, place where...pass, passage.

h4570.definition: or feminine מַעְגָּלָה; from the same as {{h5696}}; a track (literally or figuratively); also a rampart (as circular); going, path, trench, way(-side).

h4571.definition: a primitive root; to waver; make to shake, slide, slip.

h4572.definition: from {{h5710}}; ornamental; Maadai, an Israelite; Maadai.

h4573.definition: from {{h5710}} and {{h3050}}; ornament of Jah; Maadjah, an Israelite; Maadiah. Compare {{h4153}}.

h4574.definition: or (feminine) מַעֲדַנָּה; from {{h5727}}; a delicacy or (abstractly) pleasure (adverbially, cheerfully); dainty, delicately, delight.

h4575.definition: by transitive from {{h6029}}; a bond, i.e. group; influence.

h4577.definition: (Aramaic) or מְעָא; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h4578}}; only in plural the bowels; belly.

h4578.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to be soft; used only in plural the intestines, or (collectively) the abdomen, figuratively, sympathy; by implication, a vest; by extension the stomach, the uterus (or of men, the seat of generation), the heart (figuratively); belly, bowels, × heart, womb.

h4579.definition: feminine of {{h4578}}; the belly, i.e. (figuratively) interior; gravel.

h4580.definition: from {{h5746}}; also with {{h3934}} a table-buffoon, i.e.; a cake of bread; parasite; cake, feast.

h4581.definition: (also מָעוּז ); or מָעֹז (also מָעֻז; from {{h5810}}; a fortified place; figuratively, a defence; force, fort(-ress), rock, strength(-en), (× most) strong (hold).

h4582.definition: from {{h4600}}; oppressed; Maok, a Philistine; Maoch.

h4583.definition: or מָעִין; (1 Chronicles 4:41), from the same as {{h5772}}; an abode, of God (the Tabernacle or the Temple), men (their home) or animals (their lair); hence, a retreat (asylum); den, dwelling((-) place), habitation.

h4584.definition: the same as {{h4583}}; a residence; Maon, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine; Maon, Maonites. Compare {{h1010}}, {{h4586}}.

h4585.definition: or מְעֹנָה; feminine of {{h4583}}, and meaning the same; den, habitation, (dwelling) place, refuge.

h4586.definition: or מְעִינִי; probably patrial from {{h4584}}; a Meunite, or inhabitant of Maon (only in plural); Mehunim(-s), Meunim.

h4587.definition: plural of {{h4585}}; habitative; Meonothai, an Israelite; Meonothai.

h4588.definition: from {{h5774}} in the sense of covering with shade (compare {{h4155}}); darkness; dimness.

h4589.definition: from {{h5783}}; nakedness, i.e. (in plural) the pudenda; nakedness.

h4590.definition: or מַעַזְיָהוּ; probably from {{h5756}} (in the sense of protection) and {{h3050}}; rescue of Jah; Maazjah, the name of two Israelites; Maaziah.

h4591.definition: a primitive root; properly, to pare off, i.e. lessen; intransitively, to be (or causatively, to make) small or few (or figuratively, ineffective); suffer to decrease, diminish, (be, × borrow a, give, make) few (in number, -ness), gather least (little), be (seem) little, (× give the) less, be minished, bring to nothing.

h4592.definition: or מְעָט; from {{h4591}}; a little or few (often adverbial or comparative); almost (some, very) few(-er, -est), lightly, little (while), (very) small (matter, thing), some, soon, × very.

h4593.definition: passive adjective of {{h4591}}; thinned (as to the edge), i.e. sharp; wrapped up.

h4596.definition: from {{h5753}}; (compare {{h5856}}); a pile of rubbish (as contorted), i.e. a ruin; heap.

h4597.definition: probably from {{h4578}}; sympathetic; Maai, an Israelite; Maai.

h4598.definition: from {{h4603}} in the sense of covering; a robe (i.e. upper and outer garment); cloke, coat, mantle, robe.

h4599.definition: or מַעְיְנוֹ; (Psalm 114:8), or (feminine) מַעְיָנָה; from {{h5869}} (as a denominative in the sense of a spring); a fountain (also collectively), figuratively, a source (of satisfaction); fountain, spring, well.

h4600.definition: a primitive root; to press, i.e. to pierce, emasculate, handle; bruised, stuck, be pressed.
